param.name: tt_data
param.label: Transfer Timetable Data
param.description: Transfer the timetables used by the school

param.name: tt_enrolment
param.label: Transfer Enrolment Data
param.description: Transfer the enrolment lists for the timetable

param.name: eff_date
param.label: Effective Date
param.description: The effective date of the report

param.name: complete
param.label: Complete Data Set
param.description: Is this a complete set of data or just a partial update?
